data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Baksa, Assam, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baksa, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 928,121, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help the 10,451 believers in Baksa to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Baksa
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Ganak people might believe through him.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Baksa, Assam, India.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Baksa, Assam, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 950,100 citizens of Baksa, Assam, India, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

location.name: Baksa
location.people_groups_list: Koch (Hindu traditions), Assamese (Muslim traditions), Assamese (Sikh traditions), Loi, Murasing
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Koch (Hindu traditions) (50,000), Assamese (Muslim traditions) (2,691,000), Assamese (Sikh traditions) (1,100), Loi (86,000), Murasing (14,000)
